remarks: Dirichlet's theorem: there are infinitely many primes in any arithmetic progression coprime to ` N ` .  Theorem 9.4.1 of [Shapiro], p. 375. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.b $e |- ( ph -> A e. U ) $.
rpvmasum.t $e |- T = ( `' L " { A } ) $.
dirith2 $p |- ( ph -> ( Prime i^i T ) ~~ NN ) $.
